questions.question: How do I care for my jewelry?
questions.answer:
Essential jewelry care tips:

**Daily Care:**
• Store in separate boxes to prevent scratches
• Avoid contact with perfumes and chemicals
• Clean with soft cloth regularly

**Cleaning:**
• Use mild soap and warm water
• Professional cleaning recommended annually
• Avoid harsh chemicals

**Storage:**
• Keep in dry, cool place
• Use anti-tarnish strips
• Regular professional inspection

We offer free cleaning services for our customers!
